Rainy_Day_0: Might be a good day to sit back and jam on the guitar...#$e#Hey, you can relax too if you want.
Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sebastian and Luny will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Rainy_Day_2: Hey, I found one of these rolling around in the back of a drawer. [90 88 86 535]#$e#I thought you might be able to use it.
Rainy_Day_3: Aw, man. These cloudy days are kind of a drag...$7
Rainy_Day_4: How'd you sleep? The sound of rain really makes me zonk.
patio_Sam: *Sigh*... I'm never gonna land this trick...$s
Rainy_Night_0: Hey, how was your day? I just layed around and read comics most of the day... it was great.$h
Rainy_Night_1: It was a pretty low-key day for me... colas, frozen pizza, a few hours noodling around on the guitar. I feel relaxed.
Rainy_Night_2: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.#$b#It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser!$10
Rainy_Night_3: I hope Vincent's not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little guy.$s#$e#But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them.$7
Rainy_Night_4: Hey, I tossed a couple frozen pizzas into the oven. Here's yours. [206]$h
Indoor_Day_0: Phew... I'll tell you one thing I don't miss about my old life... working at JojaMart.
Indoor_Day_1: Hey, I made you some instant pancakes. Enjoy. [211]$h#$e#What? I never learned to cook... mom always did that.
Indoor_Day_2: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that I seriously love you...$l
Indoor_Day_3: Do you have big plans for the day?#$e#Oh, not me... I usually decide what to do a few moments beforehand...
Indoor_Day_4: Um... Maybe I'll help out on the farm some other day. I feel lazy today.$s#$e#You're not mad?
Indoor_Night_0: Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Maybe I'll give you a massage later.
Indoor_Night_1: My day? Oh... I can hardly remember. I didn't really do anything of note. Just relaxed and had a good time.
Indoor_Night_2: Hey, sorry I didn't make the bed. You know I'm sloppy... that's why you like me, right?$h
Indoor_Night_3: The only thing I miss about living at home is Mom's fish casserole
Indoor_Night_4: Ready to hit the hay? I actually made the bed for once...
Outdoor_0: Maybe I should get some off-road wheels for my skateboard. Mayor Lewis can't touch me out here.$h
Outdoor_1: I always keep an eye on the wide blue sky... you never know when a UFO might go by.
Outdoor_2: Hi, @! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll try and help you with encouraging thoughts.$h
Outdoor_3: Something in the air makes me feel positive... maybe it's the faint whiff of pizza from Gus' ovens.
Outdoor_4: Wow... you look great today, and the specks of mud just add some extra charm.$l
OneKid_0: I'll change %kid1's diaper... don't worry about it. You've got enough on your plate.
OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a father!$h
OneKid_3: I think we should have another kid. Why stop now?
TwoKids_0: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.$h#$e#I'm just kidding... I didn't marry you for the money.
TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
TwoKids_2: It's fun to see the babies playing with each other. I think they're going to be very close.
TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become such a family man, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$h
Good_1: Do you ever think of that night we snuck into my room? I do, often...$l
Good_2: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd be together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us.$l
Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you do something with your hair?$l^Wow, you look stunning today. Did you do something new with your hair?$l
Good_6: Be careful out there! I know you go into the caves sometimes... you could be eaten alive in there!
Good_4: Baby, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.#$e#I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.
Good_5: Baby, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.
funLeave_Sam: I'm gonna visit the family today, okay? I'll be home in the evening.
funReturn_Sam: Seeing family is nice, but it's also kind of depressing in a weird way. Like... our lives are totally separate now, and everything feels more formal than it used to.$7
spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sebastian again.
spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I thought I could get out of it now that we're married.#$e#Whatever. I guess it's funny in a weird way.
summer_1: The pollen count is a little lower in summer, so my nose is really happy.$h
summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#It might be funny to put something nasty. You know, to play a prank on the governor!$h#$e#Sorry...
summer_27: Summer's great, but I'm ready for the fall now.#$e#Should we watch the jellyfish tomorrow night? It's always kind of fun.
fall_1: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.
fall_15: Hey, tomorrow's the fair. I need to get my old slingshot wrist back in shape...
fall_26: I wonder if Mom will let Vincent enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not...$h#$e#Poor kid. He's gonna have to grow up some day...
winter_1: The cold air makes my hair gel freeze. It's not very pleasant.$s
winter_7: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? It might be fun to see everyone again...
winter_28: We had a great year, @... it's kind of sad that it's over.#$e#We'll just have to make next year even better!$h
